member.name: SpatialAudioMetadataItemsInfo
member.summary: Provides information about an object. Get a copy of this structure by calling .

member.name: SpatialAudioMetadataItemsInfo.FrameCount
member.summary: The total frame count, which defines valid item offsets.

summary.para: The current number of items stored.
The maximum number of items allowed.
The size of the largest command value defined by the metadata format.
